channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #th @ 1449566571697819651
item.description: หลังจากเทศบาลร่วมการทำงานกับ #คณะก้าวหน้า เรายกเครื่องระบบรับเรื่องร้องเรียนผ่านระบบ line chatbot มีเจ้าหน้ารับทราบปัญหาและแก้ไขทันที่ เพื่อความรวดเร็ดการแก้ปัญหา ติดตามงาน และ แจ้งกลับผู้ร้อง เปิดสถิติเรื่องร้องเรียนเป็น OpenData https://t.co/p4O2V1OGst

item.title: #ja @ 1449564702359515139
item.description: @Exodus_Solidus @aokiaoki1111 やまもといちろうこと山本一郎さんも引用のNL Times記事は「"適切な補償がない場合"倒産が増えるだろう」という20年6月時点の予測記事であり、実際の最新統計は適切な補償したようで青木氏友人の話は間違いではないです。誰も事実を示さず悪罵の数々、Dappi問題より恐ろしい。 https://t.co/N0g1DGcVVH https://t.co/1XCSuVTe3A

item.title: #es @ 1449550042164043780
item.description: En el corte de datos abiertos de este sábado: - Un Estado sigue con más casos activos que en la ola previa (Baja California) y otro sigue con un nivel similar a esa (Tabasco) - 28 Estados tienen menos casos activos que hace una semana; 1 sin cambio apreciable, y 3 al alza https://t.co/7DQ0dL5nem

item.title: #ja @ 1449371170608869381
item.description:
【2021年10月15日 九州地方の火山性地震】
九重山 1回→ 阿蘇山 90回 54⤴︎⚠️ 霧島山（えびの高原（硫黄山）周辺）2回 1↗︎‼️ 霧島山（新燃岳）2回 5↘︎ 薩摩硫黄島 10回 7⤴︎❗️ 諏訪之瀬島 61回46⤴︎⚠️
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ

item.title: #ja @ 1449371106670833673
item.description:
【2021年10月15日 伊豆・小笠原諸島の火山性地震】
伊豆大島 6回↗︎‼️※注 (10/13 3回) 硫黄島 23回 29⤵︎
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ https://t.co/rWQW4nGdAo

item.title: #ja @ 1449371054288224261
item.description:
【2021年10月15日 関東・中部地方の火山性地震】
那須岳 1回 (10/13 2回) 草津白根山（白根山（湯釜付近））2回 1↗︎‼️ 浅間山 8回 4 ↗︎‼️ 焼岳 1回 (10/12 1回) 箱根山 1回 ※注 (10/3 1回) 伊豆東部火山群 4回‼️※注 (10/12 2回)
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ

item.title: #ja @ 1449370991553966082
item.description:
【2021年10月15日 東北地方の火山性地震】
吾妻山 ※注 ※噴気の高さ 連日の80m 磐梯山 22回⬆️⬆️⚠️※注 (10/13 1回) ※2021/03/25まで遡って確認 08/01に12回今回22回の火山性地震は要注視
※1888年 磐梯山噴火参照 https://t.co/66dzC3wbW2
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ https://t.co/PeV5hvu7xH

item.description: Les offres d’emploi du @GroupeBPCE en #OpenData : « la DRH @GroupeBPCE permet d’intégrer ces données aux plateformes afin de faciliter la recherche d’emploi avec localisation des offres par ville, secteur de l’emploi, nature de l’offre, etc. » Bravo ! Au poil @PPC ! https://t.co/hYQBdQ7mF5

item.title: #de @ 1449315177183199236
item.description:
Und auch wenn es eure Arbeit natürlich nicht angemessen honoriert, so würden wir euch gerne zumindest unser Bundesstelle Open Data T-Shirt zukommen lassen. Das könnt ihr ab jetzt kostenlos hier bestellen: https://t.co/E7krz5vebG.
https://t.co/agtMAIlh8L

item.title: #de @ 1449314810479452162
item.description: Heute wollen wir von der Bundesstelle Open Data einfach mal #DankeZivilgesellschaft sagen. In den letzten Monaten haben sich über 40 Menschen an der Dokumentation der Schnittstellen des Bundes auf Github beteiligt.

item.title: #de @ 1449310368937959424
item.description: Wenn Open-Data-Begeisterte digital durchsuchbare Parlamentsdokumentationen (https://t.co/9Vou21TCZq) servierfertig vorlegen, wird verschleppt und behindert, bis das Projekt eingestellt werden muss.

item.title: #en @ 1449298961211088903
item.description: Every single piece of data that my team and I have ever collected is made available within 6 weeks of collection. One trillion data points later, no one has ever scooped us. We don’t even get credit! But we do get excellent data! #opendata. #fairdata @IMOS_AUS https://t.co/TFIdA1WRjK

item.title: #de @ 1449293411283083266
item.description: Herzliche Einladung zu unserem diesjährigen Online-Barcamp "Offene Infrastrukturen für resiliente Kommunen" am 20.11.21. Infos & Anmeldung jetzt auf https://t.co/Rb84rOntfN. Wir freuen uns auf Euch! Wer ist dabei? #opengov #opendata #OpenNRW #opensource #Buergerbeteiligung

item.title: #en @ 1449279087944638466
item.description: An important and oft-neglected topic at the crossroad of #copyright, #OpenData and #culturalpolicies, discussed by a stellar interdisciplinary crew put together by @reCreatingEU. Wanna join us? Come to the Museo Egizio in Turin or follow us online on Oct 20-21! More below 👇 https://t.co/iSaRBw5mI9

item.title: #en @ 1449268890102648834
#en @ 1449261874755821578
item.description: We are excited to be part of the National NGO forum of Uganda. Our main goal is to collaborate with other stakeholders in the NGO sector and offer our support to grow the ecosystem through the power of OpenStreetMap and open source tools. #Collaboration #OpenData #digitalskills https://t.co/BsJSmK5EsJ

item.title: #en @ 1449257512289533954
item.description: Finished adding (digitizing) the boundaries of the 15 barangays of the municipality of Mapandan, Pangasinan into @OpenStreetMap, creating their @Wikidata items, and linking the two datasets with each other. #OpenData https://t.co/v7eqPg2Syk

item.title: #es @ 1449206137346088963
item.description:
El portal de "datos abiertos" del @GobiernoMX es una porquería: lento y con muchísimos errores. Los enlaces están caídos, no es posible descargar casi nada.
Que manera de ser opacos, fingiendo incompetencia para no poder acceder a sus bases de datos.
¿Qué procede @INAImexico? https://t.co/e0RXcD5kse

item.title: #es @ 1449169638697230337
#en @ 1449117349424992261
item.description: @ArnolettoClara @Seaniesan @Esri @lapalmaopendata The image is from the 3d visualization available here: https://t.co/naQRAgEW0W and the source data is available on their open data hub: https://t.co/MGGRxE38ku

item.title: #en @ 1449115044810211331
item.description:
I have a new paper out with Shannon Cruz of @CASatPSU on motivated reasoning and lateral attitude change in the context of climate communication at the International Journal of Communication that is #OpenAccess #OpenData and #OpenMaterials
https://t.co/w8UaGguD6q 1/

item.title: #en @ 1449109657763651590
item.description: Another case where open data made it possible to identify a peculiar (but not fully explained) flaw in data, leading to a retraction. Any journal that is still not requiring open data where possible is just getting in the way of a reliable science. https://t.co/bczlky4oXW

item.title: #pt @ 1449096120181956608
item.description: Do repositório de dados do TSE: "Atenção! Informamos que a partir de 2022 o ambiente do Repositório de Dados Eleitorais será substituído pelo Portal de Dados Abertos do TSE, já disponível em https://t.co/gVpIwXMfsb" 🙏🙌 Torcendo pela melhoria dos dados! https://t.co/ntP10QWVwg

item.title: #en @ 1449095805986500608
item.description:
Most important thread you’ll read today.
Australia has been slippery with our emissions data & soundbites for a long time.
Sunlight is the best disinfectant (& source of electrons!).
Kudos to @simonahac for creating @OpenNem & now adding emissions! Play yourself. Open data 👊🏻 https://t.co/EgpSAxnLQ1

item.title: #es @ 1449094474299330562
item.description:
El SIGCDMX (https://t.co/yb6WKWGper) es una herramienta administrada por @LaAgenciaCDMX que reúne información geográfica de la Ciudad y la hace disponible en formato de datos abiertos.
Hoy el @INAImexico lo premió en el Certamen a la Innovación en Transparencia 2021. 😀 🗺️ https://t.co/5mEdWXmYvQ

item.title: #es @ 1449090915147132931
item.description: #CEPAL presentó nueva interfaz del portal #CEPALSTAT que vincula estadísticas regionales e información geoespacial de #AméricaLatina y el #Caribe. @aliciabarcena destacó importancia de la interoperabilidad de la información a través de datos abiertos. Más: https://t.co/EZNcnUF7uj https://t.co/El8DAywoqK

item.title: #en @ 1449088324899987456
item.description:
ok but every project aspires to be widely adopted as an industry / sector standard what gives @Origin_Trail advantage ?
▶️ built on internationally recognized open data standards ▶️ bringing something genuinely powerful & new no other project does = the DKG ▶️ NETWORK EFFECTS https://t.co/tvAsucKPWT

item.title: #es @ 1449087429793755136
item.description:

HD -> https://t.co/ZUg986jgmz 🧐 https://t.co/LdtXz6rhzl

item.description:
About Ocean Protocol: We are an expanding ecosystem of data suppliers, consumers, stakers, and community developers. Our aim is to build tools for people to reclaim control of their data and unleash an open data economy.
Visit https://t.co/6tquSNIEfm for more information.

item.title: #en @ 1449026331350642688
item.description: Very excited to start an open data initiative for osteosarcoma with some big names soon. The first tumor sample will consist of the most comprehensive sequencing data in existence of my mom’s extremely rare subtype. #extraskeletalosteosarcoma #sarcomaawareness #opendata #cancer

item.title: #de @ 1448984791387357194
item.description:
@ckoever - Klassiker: "Den Gigabit-Ausbau treiben wir engagiert voran."
- Es soll einen Digitalpakt 2.0 geben (Vll mal mit weniger Bürokratie?)
- Viel Startup- und Innovationsförderung (kann alles und nichts sein, auch ein Klassiker).
- Mehr OpenData und Datenstrategie
4/

Você já conhece o Espaço do Pesquisador?
O novo espaço reúne conteúdos que podem apoiar pesquisas em temas relacionados às atividades da CGU, disponibilizados em diferentes formatos: dados abertos, painéis, relatórios de controle interno etc.

item.title: #ja @ 1448946998917296135
item.description:
@hiroyoshimura 自宅放置601人、入院等調整中41人
✅合計642人を今余裕のある病院や宿泊施設に何故入って貰わないのですか
現在感染者数 3,115人 府発表の感染者数 1,304人 ✅3115−1304＝🔺1,811人もの感染者は神隠しにでもあったのですか⁉︎
✅国基準の重症者は14日現在🔺154人
https://t.co/KUG96ZhTaM https://t.co/HuN1ms2TNP

item.title: #en @ 1448941427375869974
item.description:
This superb detective work illustrates how valuable "more eyes on the data" can be. @ArtySmokesPS found this critical testing problem weeks before government agencies did.
I believe this is a small example of a large benefit that we could have with even more open data. https://t.co/UxPTKstjER

item.title: #de @ 1448940618370125830
item.description: @HejBjarne Ich war mal ein einer Veranstaltung zu Open Data in einer Hochschule. Ich war total überrascht, wie viele der Studenten kritisch gegenüber dem Thema waren. Ich hätte von der Gruppe mehr Offenheit gegenüber Open Data erwartet.

item.title: #en @ 1448921946528403485
item.description: Apparently I’ve been working on publishing open data on the web since 1996. Just rediscovered https://t.co/duNt0k2UK6 - Biz/ed was my 1st real web job, and got me into metadata, standards etc. But 26 years, oof!
